sentence: Suzanne Harp, the third-place contender who quickly seized on the reported affair, is the mother of Blake Harp, the chief of staff to Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.).
title: Texas Republican abandons reelection bid after admitting extramarital affair
